definition: lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
cheek/lower cheek/chin/jaw/to nourish
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: You can't ride the tiger forever.
sentences.chinese: 你不能总是对人颐指气使的。

sentences.english: You mean she bosses her husband around?
sentences.chinese: 你是说她对她的丈夫颐指气使？

sentences.english: E. g. (1)He broke up with his girlfriend because he got tired of putting up with her demands .
sentences.chinese: 他和女朋友分手了，因为他厌倦了忍受她的颐指气使。

sentences.english: I can't stand being bossed around by the manager.
sentences.chinese: 我受不了经理的颐指气使。

sentences.english: He compared the situation to a marriage in which the wife was bossing around her henpecked husband.
sentences.chinese: 他将之比作婚姻关系，妻子颐指气使而丈夫唯唯诺诺。

definition: to call to come and shout to go (idiom); to yell orders/always bossing people around
overbearing/arrogant bully
high and mighty (idiom); arrogant
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
to follow obediently
to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
arrogant/overbearing
to put on airs/to assume great airs
rude and unreasonable
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
to gesticulate while talking (idiom); to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily/also written 指手畫腳|指手画脚
bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient/at sb's beck and call
domineering/bossy
to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
arrogant and overbearing
lit. to shout out hoping for fives and sixes when gambling with dice; a hubbub of gambling
